Text:
First of all TAHNK YOU for Miles and the lossless codec.

FLAC is a very good format to rip music, if you use EAC for ripping please set it to generate a .CUE file, so with the cue sheet can burn a cd directly from EAC and have a perfect copy of the CD

I'm running linux, so I can't run that program. But next time I'll use a program that dumps CUE too. However, if I were to guess, a CUE sheet would go something like ...

  TRACK 01 AUDIO
    INDEX 01 00:00:00
  TRACK 02 AUDIO
    INDEX 01 02:34:20
  TRACK 03 AUDIO
    INDEX 01 05:47:15
  TRACK 04 AUDIO

  TRACK 05 AUDIO

  TRACK 06 AUDIO

  TRACK 11 AUDIO

  TRACK 12 AUDIO
    INDEX 01 32:31:40
Thanks a lot for this classic album by one of the great legends of jazz.
Thanks Superloozer for the excellent upload. I'l help in seeding this for a while :)
